message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $19,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15,000?

Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. While I believe the product offers significant value at my initial price, I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, could we possibly agree on $16,000?
